name: Bollo Rush
description:
This is the very first full game i have made (full is a loose word)

In this game, you control a Blue sad Older Man Bollo Head and a spicier Wife of his (in red)

Their names are Wilbur and Esperanza.

Wilbur can be controlled with WASD while Esperanza must be SIMULTANEOUSLY controlled by IJKL

I'm order to score, "capture" the shapes within the string connecting you two, however, if your faces get touched by the shapes you will lose health and eventually die

Other than that, its a "high score" game.. please post your high scores, it gets crazy if you get far enough into it =o)
